Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy and EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

 

 

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor

Dear Mr. Hagop,

 

The above motor policy is due for renewal, please find the attached renew terms from GIG.

 

Also attached is the vehicle list with premium calculation.

 

 

Terms released as expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy.

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer. 
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy and EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors.
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories.
*	Audit Financials Report

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer. 
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy and EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors.
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories.
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

 

 

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD)

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

*	Valid ID Copies of Directors.
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories.
*	Audit Financials Report

*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories.

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer. 
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy and EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors.
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories.
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

 

 

 

 

Best Regards,

Revised terms attached with the following changes.

*	Insured value depreciated by 17.50%
*	Rate @ 4%
*	expiring deductible (excess + 10% of claim amount) 

 

 

Also, request you to provide us the below details too:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy and EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Client’s confirm list

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy.

		 

		Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

		 

		“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

		 

		On confirmation kindly provide the following:

		 

		*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
		*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
		*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer. 
		*	VAT certificate
		*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
		*	Valid Passport copy and EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
		*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
		*	Valid ID Copies of Directors.
		*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories.
		*	Audit Financials Report

		 

		Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

		 

		 

		 

		 

		Best Regards,

		 

		Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD)
